name: deathlessly

in a way that will last for ever and never be forgotten: In this film, it's difficult to work out who's good, who's bad, and who's deathlessly loyal. A revival of his deathlessly charming ballet will brighten the summer schedule.
More examplesFewer examplesThe song was beautiful, and deathlessly romantic. From one direction the river flowed deathlessly out of the forest.Her husband was a shy, deathlessly youthful man.He wrote a number of deathlessly catchy songs that are still popular today.
